Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
Iter = fix Iter (g : dart -> dart) (n : nat) (z : dart) {struct n} : dart := match n with | 0%nat => z | S n0 => g (Iter g n0 z) end : (dart -> dart) -> nat -> dart -> dart Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope _]
Iter_upb_aux = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set) => (ndN m - card (Iter_rem_aux m z s))%nat : fmap -> dart -> set -> nat
exds = fix exds (s : set) (z : dart) {struct s} : Prop := match s with | Vs => False | Is s0 x => x = z \/ exds s0 z end : set -> dart -> Prop
f = M.f : fmap -> dart -> dart
Inductive set : Set := Vs : set | Is : set -> dart -> set
Iter_rem_aux = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => Fix Rs_wf (fun _ : set => set) (Iter_rem_F m z) : fmap -> dart -> set -> set
dart = nat : Set
P1 = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set) => let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let n := Iter_upb_aux m z s in ~ exds sr (Iter (f m) n z) : fmap -> dart -> set -> Prop
Iter_rem_aux_equation : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (sx : set), Iter_rem_aux m z sx = (let n := (ndN m - card sx)%nat in let zn := Iter (f m) n z in if exds_dec sx zn then Iter_rem_aux m z (Ds sx zn) else sx)

not_exds_card_Ds : forall (s : set) (z : dart), ~ exds s z -> card (Ds s z) = card s
Ds_s : forall (s : set) (z : dart), ~ exds s z < -> Ds s z = s

not_exds_Ds_bis : forall (s : set) (x z : dart), ~ exds s z -> ~ exds (Ds s x) z

exds_card_Ds : forall (s : set) (z : dart), exds s z -> card (Ds s z) = (card s - 1)%nat
Iter_rem = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => Iter_rem_aux m z (fmap_to_set m) : fmap -> dart -> set
exds_card_Ds_inf : forall (s : set) (z : dart), exds s z -> (card (Ds s z) < card s)%nat
not_exds_Vs : forall s : set, (forall z : dart, ~ exds s z) -> s = Vs
exds_Ds_exds : forall (s : set) (x z : dart), exds (Ds s x) z -> exds s z
exds_dec : forall (s : set) (z : dart), {exds s z} + {~ exds s z}
exds_Ds : forall (s : set) (x z : dart), x <> z -> exds s z < -> exds (Ds s x) z
exds_card_pos : forall (s : set) (z : dart), exds s z -> (0 < card s)%nat
inj_neq : forall n m : nat, neq n m -> Zne (Z.of_nat n) (Z.of_nat m)
Nat2Z.inj_sub : forall n m : nat, (m <= n)%nat -> Z.of_nat (n - m) = Z.of_nat n - Z.of_nat m

dec_eq_nat : forall n m : nat, Decidable.decidable (n = m)
exds_Ds_diff : forall (s : set) (x z : dart), exds (Ds s x) z -> x <> z
Iter_orb_aux = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set) => set_minus (fmap_to_set m) (Iter_rem_aux m z s) : fmap -> dart -> set -> set
inj_minus2 : forall n m : nat, (m > n)%nat -> Z.of_nat (n - m) = 0
